Package org.whiteflagprotocol.java.crypto

Class WfEncryptionKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.whiteflagprotocol.java.crypto.WfEncryptionKey
  • public class WfEncryptionKey
extends java.lang.Object
    Whiteflag encryption key class

    This class represents a Whiteflag encryption key. Instances of this class represent the raw key, either pre-shared or negotiated, from which the actual key material for encryption methods 1 and 2 is created.

    Whiteflag version:
    v1-draft.6
    Whiteflag standard x-reference:
    5.2.3 Key and Token Derivation

    • Field Detail

      • method

        public final int method

      • hkdfSalts

        public static final java.lang.String[] hkdfSalts
        HKDF salts array

        This array contains the HKDF salts, with the elements corresponding to the valid encryption methods for which this key class may be used.

        Whiteflag version:
        v1-draft.6
        Whiteflag standard x-reference:
        5.2.3 Key and Token Derivation

      • keyLengths

        public static final int[] keyLengths
        HKDF key lengths array

        This array contains the output key lengths, with the elements corresponding to the valid encryption methods for which this key class may be used.

        Whiteflag standard x-reference:
        5.2.3 Key and Token Derivation
